thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Pacific Century Premium Developments Says FY Loss Attributable HK$340 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pacific Century Premium Developments Says FY Loss Attributable HK$340 Mln

organizations.name: reuters) - pacific century premium developments ltd

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Pacific Century Premium Developments Ltd :
* FY LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE HK$340 MILLION VERSUS LOSS HK$364.0 MILLION
* FY CONSOLIDATED REVENUE DECREASED BY 6 PER CENT TO ABOUT HK$164 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
